title: Melting Face
description:
A yellow smiley face melting into a puddle. 

The eyes and mouth slip down the face, yet still maintain a distorted smile. This quality lends this emoji to sarcasm.

Can be used literally to talk about extreme heat. Can also be used metaphorically to talk about embarrassment, shame, a slowly sinking sense of dread, or feeling overwhelmed in some way.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the melting face emoji presents a surreal, almost liquid-like visage, with its features smoothly dissolving downwards. This Apple rendering captures a sense of overwhelming emotion, like extreme embarrassment, heat, or a feeling of being completely done, conveyed through subtle gradients and soft, rounded edges that suggest a fluid state. The overall effect is both humorous and relatable, perfectly embodying that moment when you wish you could just melt away, as seen on Appleâ€™s vibrant displays.
